border.description: Adds a colored border to the component.

border-color.description: Specifies the color of the border. Accepts any color value.
border-color.description_zh: 指定边框的颜色。接受任何颜色值。

closable.description: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.
closable.description_zh: 添加可以隐藏警报的关闭图标。

close-icon.description: Change the default icon used for closable alerts.
close-icon.description_zh: 更改用于可关闭警报的默认图标。

close-label.description: Text used for aria-label on closable alerts. Can also be customized globally in Internationalization.
close-label.description_zh: 用于可关闭警报上的 aria-label 的文本。也可以在 Internationalization 中全局定制。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用工具颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 0 到 24 之间的高程。您可以在海拔页面上找到更多信息。

height.description: Sets the height for the component.

icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the v-icon component.
icon.description_zh: 使用 v-icon 组件应用特定图标。

location.description: Specifies the component’s location. Can combine by using a space separated string.
location.description_zh: 指定组件的位置。可以使用空格分隔的字符串进行组合。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-model.description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
v-model.description_zh: 控制组件是可见还是隐藏。

position.description: Sets the position for the component.

prominent.description: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.
prominent.description_zh: 显示一个更大的垂直居中图标以吸引更多注意力。

rounded.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be 0, xs, sm, true, lg, xl, pill, circle, and shaped. Find more information on available border radius classes on the Border Radius page.
rounded.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 0、xs、sm、true、lg、xl、pill、circle 和 shaped。在 Border Radius 页面上查找有关可用边界半径类的更多信息。

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定根元素上使用的自定义标记。

text.description: Specify content text for the component.

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

type.description: Create a specialized alert that uses a contextual color and has a pre-defined icon.
type.description_zh: 创建使用上下文颜色并具有预定义图标的专用警报。

variant.type: text / flat / elevated / tonal / outlined / plain
variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.
variant.description_zh: 将不同的样式应用于组件。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: click:close
events.description: Emitted when close icon is clicked.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: append
slots.description: Slot for icon at end of alert.

slots.name: close
slots.description: Slot for icon used in dismissible prop.
slots.description_zh: 用于 dismissible prop 的图标插槽。

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Slot for icon at beginning of alert.

slots.name: text
slots.description: Slot for the component’s text content.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.
